sqlite3-editor.ui.alignNumberRight.markd: If true, numbers in table cells are aligned to the right.
sqlite3-editor.ui.defaultIndexName.table: The default index name that gets filled in when creating a new index. {{tableName}} will be replaced by the table name.
The default index name that gets filled in when creating a new index. {{tableName}} will be replaced by the table name, and {{columns}} will be replaced by the column names.
sqlite3-editor.ui.recordCountingLimit.ma: Specifies the cap on the number of records the extension will count. Lower values can help prevent performance degradation on larger tables. Set the value to -1 to disable the limit.
sqlite3-editor.ui.foreignKeyDropdownLimi: Max number of records to display in a foreign key dropdown.
sqlite3-editor.codeLens.hideExecuteAndSe: Hides the "▷ Select" and "▷ Execute" buttons above SQL statements in the Query Editor. You can still execute SQL statements by other means such as Shift+Enter.
sqlite3-editor.diagnostics.disableSyntax: Disables the syntax checker in the query editor.
sqlite3-editor.completion.functionCase.m: Controls whether function names in auto completions are capitalized or not.
sqlite3-editor.ui.performanceNotice.mark: Displays a message to optimize slow query.
